description:
My place is close to Wheated, Werkstatt, Am Thai Bistro. You’ll love my place because of the outdoors space, the neighborhood, the comfy bed, and the light. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
PRIVATE OUTDOOR SPACE

TWO BIG SCREEN TV'S, CABLE AND INTERNET.

YOU HAVE THE PATIO AND GRILL ALL TO YOURSELF

LOTS OF NEW BARS AND RESTURANTS

CLOSE TO THE F TRAIN AT FORT HAMILTON PARKWAY. AND THE BUSS TO THE B AND Q TRAIN
name: Spacious 1 bedroom with Private Deck with Grill
review: Neighborhood was typical Brooklyn. Bodega was close and convenient.
